website_summaries.verdict: A spooky addition to any Halloween decor.
pros: 6-foot tall model, made from weather resistant plastic
Arm, hip, and knee joints lock into multiple poses
Bones appear cracked and weathered for added spookiness
cons: Model can't stand on its own – needs to be propped against a wall or chair

customer_reviews.title: Useless man
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting a mail order husband and got a lazy sack of bones that evidently is no different than my current husband who lays about. I'll still give him 5 stars because at the very least he makes me laugh and my current husband doesn't like to mess with him.
customer_reviews.author: ELLE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  I have 7 of these outside the  house!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the coolest Halloween decoration I've ever used! Easy to pose, no tools needed. I used tie wraps to keep it in place. They've been thru a storm with rain and wind and still look awesome! Lots of compliments from neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch - it's NOT Crazy Bone Brand!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the seller advertises "Crazy Bone" brand, but sends you a piece of off brand junk!! If this was the Crazy Brand it would be made better, I have other Crazy Bone items! Nice try seller!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loren P

customer_reviews.title: Broken arm
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this skeleton! Always wanted one. It's everything I expected except the arm broke the second time I moved it. The plastic just cracked and it's only hangin on my a thread. For the amount I paid I expected a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE HER!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Audrey for Halloween last year for my office. She’s turned out to be so much fun so she’s still here. People tell her hello in the morning as they pass by and we all chat with her. Okay fine, I’m the only one that chats with her but she’s a really good listener. She’s gotten a wardrobe now and as you can tell by the photo, she’s getting ready for Mardi Gra. She got a bit chilly during the polar vortex so the ‘wood burning stove’ really came in handy . Shhh don’t tell her but I’m getting her a boyfriend and a dog for this Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Halloween Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skeleton the joints are well made to set up in different pose. I bought him to use for Halloween decoration. I ordered one to see how the quality was and will be ordering him a buddy. Please note he will not stand by himself you will need to prop him up. I plan on using old speaker stands or possibly tomato cages used upside down to pose him.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the money. Not perfect - they don't stand on their own, and the hip, shoulder, wrist joints don't have any rotation. So they can't hold a drink, cross their legs, or do ballet poses, they can't quite get into most natural positions because of that. But looks? So good. Human size, almost, and really effective decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Robin in FL

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: This isn't what we wanted. The joints only move one direction. The hands will always face down and cannot hold a prop. The jaw hangs open and would need to be wired shut. This skeleton isn't able to cross it's leg, stretch it's arms out to the sides, or have it's hands touch. Wish I would've known!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great porch skeletons!
customer_reviews.text: I love these guys! Bought two for my front porch and they are pretty great-are they 100+ dollar quality? No, but for the price they do the job! I love that they are posable but wish the arms could do more than just move up and down. Same for hands-they look good but the fingers are not movable unless you want to try to heat them and molt them differently. They feel fairly sturdy and look great for what I need them for. Would def purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: leb12280

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! We decided to decorate the front of our house this year and used this guy behind some spider webs. The limbs stay in the places you put them, and if they don't at first just use a screw driver to tighten the screws at the joints. This skeleton will need something to lean on or something to hold it up. We used our bird feeder's shepard hook you can buy at Lowes for $7 to keep this guy standing strong. I then used 1 black zip tie to ensure the skeleton stayed attached to the shepard hook. I knew this was a hit when parents had kids take pictures in front of our Halloween decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Hail Linux, king of the OS.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect companion for travel, roadtrips, movies, dates, parties, and guarding your car when you're not there.
customer_reviews.text: We named our skeleton B.O.B (Built of Bones) and he's the perfect companion! He's a good listener, won't nibble on your food when you're not looking, and he always thinks you have nice skin. (You shouldn't let him drink though-everything goes right through him.) I tell people he was a hitchhiker I picked up while passing the local cemetery. He's been having the time of his afterlife since he's been with us, and he now has his own Instagram so others can keep up with his adventures.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Better than what you get in a store, but....
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a Halloween walk-through we put in for the neighborhood. They’re cool looking but the don’t articulate like we thought they would. Also, one of their arms broke off almost as soon as we got it. As you can see, we temporarily repaired it with a garden twist tie. We’ll do a more permanent fix after Halloween. We like them. Better than what you can buy in a store. But for the $ we thought they’d pose better and would be less fragile. Still, they look cool for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: mike d.

customer_reviews.title: This really looks like a SKELETON and I just screamed when my grandson ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this handsome bag of bones for my grandson. SCARRRRRY..... This really looks like a SKELETON and I just screamed when my grandson let it lean toward me. We plan on having a Halloween pasture hayride - and the handsome bag of bones will be hanging in the pasture from a tree where our Hallooooweeen hayride will ride by as the handsome bag of bones falls out of a tree attached to a rope. There will also be a zombie monster (a zombie mask bought at Amazon of course) that will chase the Hayride around the pasture forest. Yep, it's a SCARRY, SCARRY Halloween ride we shall have thanks to Amazon that sales such great ideas from great companies.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Petite

customer_reviews.title: does seem to stay in position and is easy to adjust the joints tension etc
customer_reviews.text: received waaay ahead of schedule just b4 Halloween too. decent build quality, does seem to stay in position and is easy to adjust the joints tension etc. Each joint does not swivel, only pivots 2 ways, same as other competitive models.
customer_reviews.author: wired

customer_reviews.title: No bones about it. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Larger than expected. Wish arms would have moved other ways except up and down. But it's an awesome prop for our Jeep
customer_reviews.author: OBX2MTNLOVERS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for this price point
customer_reviews.text: I use one of these in an "escape room" game business, and it is heavily played with by hundreds of customers a week. They manipulate it and carry it around, pose with it in photos, etc. It took 8 months of this heavy abuse before one of the arm sockets broke, though I think that was due to a customer trying to force it into an unusual position rather than a fault of the product. The appearance of the skeleton is also superior to many other options in a similar price range. It is more detailed and realistic than the skeletons sold at Home Depot, for example.
customer_reviews.author: John Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: As this was on the more "expensive" end of cheap plastic skeletons, I was expecting something that would at least wait until arrival to break. This poor guy was delivered with a broken "collarbone," as well as a loose jaw that can do nothing but hang open (there are no exposed screws to tighten it). All that being said these flaws can be easily covered, but are pretty disappointing for something that's >$50 (skeleton + stand). It arrived with a broken collar bone.
customer_reviews.author: Vf23

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Halloween item!
customer_reviews.text: it have not a clue why people left bad reviews on this. "herman" is perfect (that is what I named him)!. He is sturdy, well made....the only thing he does not do is talk! There is no wire, as some reviewers have stated. He is pose able, stays in place, all held to together with metal bolts or rivets. I am extremely happy with this purchase and he will be my favorite Halloween décor item for many years to come! He is going to sit on my front porch bench. Don't let the bad reviews deter you from purchasing this item!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Killen

customer_reviews.title: Spine snapped in half the day we got it
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and spine was good (we checked that first after reading reviews). Propped her up at the window for a couple of hours (standing) and when I went to move it the spine was half way separated already. While applying a glue it completely snapped in half and no glue is strong enough to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survived a hurricane!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Durable, nice looking, reasonably posable. He has been riding a unicycle in our front yard, until last night when the hurricane took him out. Found him sprawled out in the driveway, still in perfect condition. So, he literally survived a hurricane. Well worth the money. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Only sort of poseable
customer_reviews.text: There is only minor hinge articulation so if you want the hands to go up into a scary pose, they'll do that - but really not anything else. The hands can't rotate and the shoulders don't rotate at all so you can't really angle the arms any other way than up and down. I wanted my skeleton to hold a candy dish so i unscrewed the hands and reattached them upside down. It's not idea but I think I can make it work for creative purposes. The jaw wants to fall open.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 5 foot tall lady friend dumped me. Saw this 5 foot tall skeleton just before Halloween. Bought long black hair wig, stood her up by front door and named her after my ex. Very good quality, especially for price. Many times, especially early am when first up I have looked outside and startled because someone was on porch. It was the skeleton. I don't plan to put her away Know couple who have two on deck. They dress them for various holidays. Very easy to pose.
customer_reviews.author: Allan mckibben

customer_reviews.title: Mr Bones
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Bones is so great! He is well made and completely able to pose. Although he doesn't stand on his own he has a loop connected to his head so you can hang him. I love that you can move his jaw up and down and his head back and forth. He's 5 feet tall. I am disappointed in the pricing. His price dropped 20 bucks since I bought him. I've never seen such a price fluctuation in any product on amazon. It's very disappointing. That being said, I just love this skeleton.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Melody

customer_reviews.title: This is Mark
customer_reviews.text: Having a ton of fun with this skeleton! His name is Mark and he is everything 😂 Follow him on instagram at mark_the_skeleton. He might even follow you back 😉. He sturdy and stays posed pretty well. Working on making something to get him to stand by himself as he cant right now. I would like to be able to move his wrists and his arms a bit more though. They don't bend out like our arms do. Either way he's a ton of fun and when he goes for car rides gets all the best looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Very happy with purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far! Can’t wait to use it out front for Halloween. Arrived in a box, fully assembled (folded) and unfolded easily and I’ve been able to bend it in diff poses (sitting/standing/arms and legs moved and the head turns) very Happy with purchase. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Halloween is right around the corner.
customer_reviews.text: I am currently plotting (like an evil villain) my 2020 Halloween yard display. I was delighted to find this skeleton at a reasonable price and a high review rating. The skeleton arrived (today) mostly assembled and in a sturdy box. I did had to attach the skull to the neck vertebrae, and the neck to the spine. Although it wasn’t difficult, I did have to loosen some screws in the thoracic cavity to make the process easier. Luckily, the plastic appears to be well made and it was an easy process.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this Skely just way to cool! I ordered on 2017 for my photoshoot and Skely become my ultimate traveling partners. I am still using her for several photoshoot and she looks amazing 🤓🤣just like new ! It does hold pose doesn’t break easily. Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tunde

customer_reviews.title: Good skeleton...well made
customer_reviews.text: One of those "always wanted one" kind of items and Halloween was a good excuse to buy. I'm glad I got this one because it has good feature and good quality.....and seem pretty well anatomically correct. "She" is sitting in a living room chair and really gets the attention of anyone coming in the front door. Joints work well as does the mouth...open, closed or in between.. I call her Mrs Bates.
customer_reviews.author: Elphy 2

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality skeleton
customer_reviews.text: The pirate stuff does remove easily and the skeleton works great. Is very poseable and will be very useful in my halloween displays for years to come. I ordered 2 skeletons from the DIYoutlet.com and they were grey and gross. These are much more eye appealing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love this.  He Rides on my Motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I've look at other Pose-N-Stay type skeletons, but none are as "solid" as this one is. I actually have him setting/riding on my motorcycle with me. Fits great. Legs tie-wrapped to the top of the shocks, mid-section belted to the backrest, one hand tie-wrapped to his leg and the other hand Velcro strapped to my shoulder. I've ridden on the freeway at 75mph without an issue.  I caught it on sale for ~$45...once I got it, I tried to buy another, but the price jumper to about $70. If I knew it was this good, I would have paid $70.....for the first one, but not the second. I'll wait for a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Duzan

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as described
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a big more hardiness to the plastic. These guys are pretty delicate. Positions pretty much stay in place. Also, the review photos show black painted shadowing to the sockets and hollow spaces of a skull but all for of mine are dark dusty brown. For the spook factor, I wished they arrived as pictured in the listing and confirmed in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mann Family

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Came broken. The shoulder and head won’t go back into the place they are supposed to be and it arrived like this. Can’t say I’m surprised when they shipped me a damaged box. But like really? The only way the head would have came off like this is if it was never screwed into place to begin with. I have to unscrew the whole rib cage and shoulders to put it back in place. WHO SHIPS A DEFECTIVE ITEM WITHOUT EVEN LOOKING AT IT.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Clark

customer_reviews.title: This is false advertising!  Not a Crazy Bonez skeleton!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Crazy bonez product. I purchased what was advertised and it is CLEARLY not what I paid for. The one one the left is an actual crazy bonez skeleton which is worth the money. The one on the right is a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Condie

customer_reviews.title: Good price, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: When I received the skeleton it was crammed in the box so tightly that it was broken in several places. The ribs on one side, and above the clavicle were separated from the other bones and the left leg is broken off at the pelvis, completely unattached. I needed it for a project so I didn't have time to return it for another one and hope the replacement wasn't broken as well. I kept it and can hopefully fix it well enough to be used. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: AngelGirl

customer_reviews.title: The best affordable skeleton prop that you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this probably the best looking full size skeleton you can buy. MUCH more realistic looking than the poorly detailed skeletons you see in Halloween shops and department stores. Last Halloween I set up a Pirates Of The Caribbean display based on the Disneyland ride, and with some props and added blue lighting that simulates the ocean, my skeleton looked amazing! If I ever create a full size haunted house, I would be buying a dozen more of these Crazy Bonez skeletons. Pics are provided
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Halloween in July? Yes you can!
customer_reviews.text: I've got Halloween on the brain and it's only July! I had him in my wishlist forever and just pulled the plug. He's awesome and I can't wait to display him with my Crazy Bonez dog and fish. EDITED: His head won't stay connected and when I tried to pop it back through the neck bone, it completely fell off. My husband is handy so, I'm hoping he can get it to stay. This was a pretty expensive purchase for all the work we are having to put into it.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: Halloween Decor Must-Have - thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: If you would know me, you would know that I love me some Halloween. My collection gets bigger and bigger every year and the one thing missing was this lifesize skeleton, which I have been eyeballing for quite some time. Great value for the money, and it came carefully packed. You cannot move all the joints but after reading the manufacturer's description I did not expect that anyway. It would have been great if it would come with a bag to store it after Halloween, but this way I will just move it through our house and scare my husband :)
customer_reviews.author: LaLopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! Very well made and realistic! I’m using Mr. Bonez as my co-rider in my Corvette. Several people were taking pictures the first time Mr. Bonez and I went for a ride yesterday. He told me he had been dying to ride in a Corvette all of his life! At least nobody can accuse me of talking to myself now that I’m not alone while cruising! Mr. Bonez is a welcomed companion. Truely this is a quality product and you will be well pleased with your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Jerry Spinefeld
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased arrived broken but I was sent a new one right away and it arrived in good condition. We are having the best time with Jerry Spinefeld! We are excited for Halloween and have all kinds of ideas for poses. He bends and sits easily as you can see. I do wish his arm twisted a little more and if his fingers could bend that would be nice. Nevertheless, he's pretty cool for the money!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This skeleton is very solid and sturdy. Compared to others that you can purchase at a craft store, this one is fully pose-able and your imagination is your only limitation on what you can do with it. We are big Halloween fans at our house and we HAD to get this one. We posed him going up the side of the house and had a skeleton dog chomping at its toes. It was great fun and a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Marge0808

customer_reviews.title: Firm enough to stand and pose.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed skeleton. We’ll see how it stands up to the elements over time. Pros - 1. sturdy construction. Stiff enough to stand on its own with something to lean against. 2. Hard plastic bones. 3. Movable mandible and swivel head. 4. Joints firm enough to stay in place when moved. Cons. - 1. Arms and legs only move up and down, not out. 2. Skull connection to spine feels a little weak.
customer_reviews.author: TRON

customer_reviews.title: This came yesterday and is broken in two places! ...
customer_reviews.text: This came yesterday and is broken in two places!!!.. I need it for an event this weekend so thee is no time to return it so I have to try to glue and tape it 😞😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She's a great model for lighting purposes
customer_reviews.text: I use this skeleton as a body form for lighting purposes as a model. I recommend the stand that comes separately. its a little wobbly, and the arms and body dont stay where i put them without some propping. I've never had a problem with it falling over on the stand. I have her (yes, its a she to me) dressed in size 8 clothes, and I've added bubble wrap to give her some dimension. this is no good for accurate medical purposes, but she has been a great model where a person-sized form is needed. And a great price at 1/3 the cost of mannequins and sewing forms.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Diver

customer_reviews.title: Crazy about My Crazy Bonez Skeleton!
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy about my Crazy Bonez Skeleton! I've named him Harold and he is just perfect. He can be posed in any position you want, and the joints can be loosened or tightened. His joints are held together with strong screws and nuts that won't loosen up on their own. I love that his jaw is also able to be opened and closed. He is the perfect Halloween Skeleton and a perfect addition to our Halloween Decor!
customer_reviews.author: C. Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Good decoration
customer_reviews.text: These are only about as tall as a 5’ tall adult. They can be posed. In an easy pose, like sitting in a chair, they’re perfect. Standing up you need a pole or shepherds hook, and zip ties. I paired these with the skeleton dogs from a different company and now have a literally traffic-stopping display. I did have to use additional zip ties to get the arms to stay in the right position.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Don't ask my why my granddaughter wanted a life size skeleton for Christmas but she asked for one and of course this Grandma couldn't say no but didn't want to pay $100. It seems to be sturdy enough and was movable. She was happy that is all I care about.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these fellows, one for outside and one that spends October on our couch. They hold positions well and look good. I do wish that the shoulder joints moved more freely (I wanted arms out to the sides) to allow more positions for the arms, but they only move in flexion close to the body. Despite this, we'll look forward to having them around again next October.
customer_reviews.author: Thera99

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra. Best brand = truth
customer_reviews.text: Definitely is a higher quality than other brands. We have a bunch of skeletons and this one you can pose in any position and his joints stay how you pose him. More durable and better craftsmanship than others we have. As you can see here he’s standing upright (and has been for weeks) on his own, even with a kitten in the house. Parrot and piranha purchased separately lol
customer_reviews.author: KellBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for decorations
customer_reviews.text: I love this skeleton. I bought this a couple Halloweens ago and have used it in my decorations ever since. I named him Skelly and sometimes Skelly is in costume, sometimes he's just chilling in a chair in the kitchen to greet people. People love posing with him for selfies. Just be careful if drunk people are going to be around, one guy broke Skelly's arm by lifting it sideways (in a way it's obviously not supposed to be moved) and it snapped. I need to glue it back on, but other than that Skelly has served me well!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: The perfect party guess
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Halloween decoration. It worked well and looked good. But then I bent the arm the wrong way while trying to carry to much and it broke off. I can't really blame the product because I was being reckless but it did happen. So just be careful with your spooky boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold limbs in position as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It looks fine but the primary feature is that it is supposed to stay in position when posed. I tried tightening the bolts, as per the instructions but found that the nuts would not grip. Overall, I would have been better served buying a less expensive unit since this one does not do what I paid extra for.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Todd Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for some bones!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a new neighborhood so we really wanted to make an impression and make Halloween a lot of fun. Ordered two of these and got them both in 2 days via Prime. Very happy with the purchase and have one on our roof and the other hanging out by the chimney. We love the flexibility of them and they appear well built, so should last for several years. I wish the bendable joints could be tightened more, but overall very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these. For the money, I’m happy. I pulled them out of the box, set them up and left them. When the season was over I put them back in the box. I suspect if you rearrange them very much they won’t last. I did have one of five arrive with a broken hand but fixing it was minor.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Head fell off right away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my son. We did not open it for weeks as it was a gift. The first day we set it up the head fell off without any provocation. Would have returned but I ordered too far in advance of the time we actually needed it for and it is past the return date. SO UPSET! (It did not pay to be organized and order early in this case!)
customer_reviews.author: tova plaut

customer_reviews.title: Fun decoe
customer_reviews.text: I have this guy on my front yard and all the neighborhood kids love him. He’s fairly lightweight and tall. I zip tied him to a chair. Great addition to my Halloween decor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need more of these
customer_reviews.text: I love this skeleton I thought I would only use it for my Christmas tree past president future design but now Boner has become a part of the family we dress him up for every holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda's

customer_reviews.title: Great skeleton for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This skeleton is awesome! Good color, looks old. He poses well when his screws are tight. We put him in different poses around the house. update: This is my second purchase of this skeleton. We have a Victorian house and they really add a smile to your face when you see them in the window. joints move easily, does not stand up on its own, lean him on a wall or use the loop on the top of the skull to secure him to the window/wall. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: TAdelmann

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: So the skeleton looks awesome and it’s life size but the only issue I have is the bones are hollow so when you bend the arm or any part you have to be extra careful as they look like they are coming apart. But for the price I guess what can you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Dean & Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Came with strong mildew odor
customer_reviews.text: My skeleton arrived with a very strong mildew smell. I am hoping the manufacturer can replace with one that is not so stinky. Even the packaging has to be put outside along with skeleton due to such mold odor. Otherwise seems ok. Please contact me asap.
customer_reviews.author: Birdhaven

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Frank and Erma make excellent houseguests. They've been living with us for about a year now and like to hang out all over the house and dress up for various seasons. This was their first Halloween, and they were quite the attraction. Several people stopped to take photos with them! The posable joints are great and make it easy to pose them in different positions. After about a year, I see no signs of wear. You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and looked to be in perfect condition while still in the box, but it's spine immediately cracked and broke in half when removing it. There was no way to even mend it as the skeleton is very heavy. Really disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Err

customer_reviews.title: Love Love LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love my new skelly!! He is not as sturdy as I was hoping at his joints but still worth the money in my opinion. I plan to keep him out year round. Not bad for $54.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Best roommate ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love Mr. C. Bonez. Unfortunately one of his ankle joints was broken when he arrived but I don't care. It doesn't matter. I still love it. He's a stylish dresser (clothes not included), doesn't eat much and hardly makes a sound. He's nice to have around and fun to watch horror movies with. Can't wait to see him in his xmas clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Raindays

customer_reviews.title: I named mine Johnnie
customer_reviews.text: I live alone, and am a bit excentric. I kept him in the living room after halloween, cause he was company. Had him sit playing the piano for awhile. I didn't put up a Christmas tree this year, but put a santa hat & a red bow on him, and stacked the presents on his lap and around him .now trying to justify keeping him for Valentines day -- say with a bouquet in one hand and a box of chocolates under the other arm?
customer_reviews.author: P. Like

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her new me bones!!! She has dreams of going to medical school and I got this for her for Christmas and an anatomy book and she is enjoying learning all of the bones.. and she also likes to dress it up and put it in the passenger seat as she drives lol
customer_reviews.author: Truevet

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect..
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect...but pretty cool looking. The wrists and ankles only go up and down not side to side which is why I gave it only 4 stars. I wanted to set this skeleton up in a chair with a cigarette and a beer bottle to show end results of indulging...lol. Can't do it because wrists do not rotate. Oh well, but I bought the Seasons skeleton cat and have it in the chair with the skeleton's hand petting it. Awesome. It also arrived a day earlier than stated. I am very happy with purchase and will be adding to my "Seasons bonez collection" in the future.
customer_reviews.author: NeedaCorona

customer_reviews.title: Same product half the price at Home Depot
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. No doubt about that. However, an equally great product can be purchased from Home Depot for $30! I did not discover this until after I had this skeleton. I bought two from Home Depot. Same exact height, amount of detail and realism, and joint manipulation, sturdiness. And a bonus, the ones from Home Depot have glowing red eyes, batteries included. So while I recommend this skeleton to any Halloween enthusiasts, I'd suggest the better bargain at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween Decorations for Outside
customer_reviews.text: This guy so great that I bought another. It’s heavier than I had thought so I doubt it will move around in the wind, but still light enough to make posing and hanging him easy. His joints bend and hold their positions.
customer_reviews.author: ririri

customer_reviews.title: poor range of motion
customer_reviews.text: Posable is a bit misleading the shoulders the arms front and back only. think Franenstien range of motion. Many of my hopes and plans for poses had to be canceled. it is realistic looking and with a screwdriver, you can make some poses stay by tightening joints
customer_reviews.author: Arthur B. Aten

customer_reviews.title: Loose
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this in our front yard for Halloween but its poses are limited. It doesn’t like to stay in poses too much. It needs to be supported in a pose. You can place it in a chair and it will do ok. If you want it to wave, you’ll need to prop the arm up somehow because it will eventually drop down.
customer_reviews.author: Debra T.

customer_reviews.title: Part of the family
customer_reviews.text: Look this guy has been a blast year round. His name is Myex. He is part of the family. He seatbelts into my truck front seat and if zi stop for a beer he sits in the stool next to me. Endless fun, must have.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mulle

customer_reviews.title: Broken in Shipping... Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a steller prop but it came snapped in half upon recieving it. It was broken on the lowest vertebrae by the screw. Other than getting it broken in two peices I wouldsay thiscould be a nice addition to mycollection. Itis not its a broken skelton imnot sure what to do with because amazon would not allow a like for like exchange.. Note to company your pack out sucks.. your products break in sbipping
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: These skeletons are not fully poseable as described. The joints only move in one direction and some of the joints the screws (which directions instruct you to loosen and tighten to pose) are hidden so you cannot even access them to loosen and tighten. As I was trying to pose it was tight and I was concerned of breaking. I’m not sure on durability as I just set them up for the season and they are under cover.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeManiac

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Hes a great size he sits in my car as a gag lots of fun hes made well a kid poped his head off the spine i admit went in to surgery mode and to my surprise there is a wire holding the head in place i poped the head back in the just like new might want to tight all the joints
customer_reviews.author: Gary at bay

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I just got this skeleton. It is a bit lighter and less dense than I imagined, but it does pose. Will update my review in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorUp

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Was great for our movie night at work. (Pirates of the Caribbean) so we dressed him up as a pirate and sat him in the fly bridge from an old boat. People were taking pictures with him all night. Was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: FraggleRock

customer_reviews.title: He's amazing:) Fits right in
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for:) Has a good height, realistic features, and good weight, adjustable limbs and you can loosen and tighten however need be.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not Crazy Bones
customer_reviews.text: This not from the Crazy Bones Brand as they imply but instead a cheap knockoff, very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: etoile

customer_reviews.title: I like him
customer_reviews.text: His arms don’t move quite like I wanted, I wanted to wrap them around a post, and he is not very tall, but otherwise I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: anitajane

customer_reviews.title: Best skeleton ever!!!! Henry DaBonez
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this incredible guy for my son for Christmas and named him Henry DaBonez . My son is 14, so I figured he just wanted to annoy me by placing him in various poses and places around the house. Turns out my family, friends, and coworkers are having more fun with Henry than he is. Henry even has an Instagram lol @henrydabonez Bonus: Henry’s a Saints fan! WHO DAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabra Reich

customer_reviews.title: Edit: The skeleton is awesome but check the seller of this product!
customer_reviews.text: Check the seller! If it is not amazon it will probably be not a crazy bonez skeleton but a cheap ripoff. The real product is very high quality and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Looks real and can pose this skeleton in different angles
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Bonez hangs out with us all year long. He even got dressed up for Christmas 💀🎅 Originally got him for Halloween, didn't have the heart to stuff him in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome decoration, poses are great!
customer_reviews.text: This skeleton is going to be a ton of fun this Halloween (and many to come). It's really easy to pose into all kinds of wacky positions, but my favorite is just having him sit on a chair looking human. I thought it was a bit pricey but now that I have it, the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but difficult to maintain upright body position.
customer_reviews.text: I love this skeleton, I put it in my front yard walking a skeleton dragon on a leash, but it was very hard to get it to stay standing up. The body position doesn't lock very well.
customer_reviews.author: HomerBear

customer_reviews.title: Decent skeleton, I can confirm the other reviews, ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent skeleton, I can confirm the other reviews, but the hip bone is not connected to the leg bone on one side and so when I try to position this guy around, the hip keeps popping out. When I inspected further, clearly someone put the screw in, but missed, so the screw didn't fully get through. Maybe my husband can fiddle with it and get it to stick, but that's kind of a deal breaker when it cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie B.

customer_reviews.title: He's Not All That Scary
customer_reviews.text: I like "Bones' because he is durable and surley look good at all the tailgate events. You can dress him up and he is ready to "spook" your friends & guests.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: great for outside dispays
customer_reviews.text: a bit less sturdy than the original I purchased 5 years ago, but still a great product. I wish the elbow and knee joints were also articulating for side positioning. That would be an awesome upgrade to the posing possibilities
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I named him Artemis.
customer_reviews.text: My husband broke one of the arms trying to put a shirt on it, but that didn't stop this skeleton from following his dreams. I bought him in a pregnancy episode where I wanted someone to stay home with me. He was a great comfort and super fun to carpool with.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration
customer_reviews.text: Great decoration for Halloween. Came packaged well. Love that I can pose and move him around. Wig and belt can come of if wanted. The only thing is that his hands don't turn so he can't hold something. Otherwise he is great.
customer_reviews.author: sewn4me

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this guy
customer_reviews.text: We Love, Love Love this guy. We have him set up in a window upstairs looking out over our neighborhood. Such a hoot. He is well-made, easy to pose, sturdy and can be used indoors or outdoors. This is our second purchase of this guy and have thought about putting a series of them on our garage roof, attempting to break into a second floor window. This photo isn't best because it was taken at night from a distance, but you get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: AnitaJRT

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: Boney is the best. He’s a freaking Godsend and has already brought me so much joy. He will fill your empty soul with happiness. I could not be happier with this addition to my family. He’s quiet, enjoys video games and IPA. What else could you possibly need?
customer_reviews.author: jwbw1109

customer_reviews.title: Loove these skeletons.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Awesome price (I paid $35 each), these types of skeletons are usually $100 each so I was really excited when they went on sale. They come in a reasonably sized box, very easy to put back in for storage. Posing them is also really easy. I mostly had them sitting on my front porch in chairs waving out to the street.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: but he sits in his porch chair just fine as a Halloween decoration
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, the spine is too fragile. Our skeleton snapped in half where the vertebrae meet the spine about 10 minutes out of the box despite careful handling. I performed a little surgery by loosening the pelvic screws, using zip ties to link the two pieces, then tightening the screws up again. He's a little more wobbly than before, but he sits in his porch chair just fine as a Halloween decoration. It would be nice if the spine were reinforced somehow since this seems to be a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I dispatch for our local police department and we host a community Trick or Treat every year. We purchased this guy for this years event and I've had so much fun "positioning and scaring" the department employees since it's arrived! I can't wait for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: KNorris

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Skeleton was very life like. Used it in a car show and got lots of attention. Easily positioned for sitting and could lean against the car and it would not fall down. The only con:. There is spring in each bone connection, allowing the articulation.......which is the best feature of the skeleton after all............it can be difficult to compress the spring between the bolt and nut. Thus needing 2 people to accomplish a repair. I am amazed at the detail for such a reasonable price. Halloween is coming. .I'm definitely buying a dog skeleton to go with my man skeleton. Add fog machine...ooh scary!
customer_reviews.author: darlene in Ventura

customer_reviews.title: I love him!
customer_reviews.text: He’s the perfect size. Goes great with my skeleton theme living room.. he stands on his own when you lean him against something that’s all I need to do with him.. he’s quite flexible just not as flexible as I thought he would be. The shipping was super fast and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justine mccain

customer_reviews.title: The real Crazy Bonez
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine from the link "sold and shipped by Amazon". I received the genuine Crazy Bonez item. I added googly eyes to liven them up. I stuck them on with two way adhesive tape pads. These guys still startle me when I come through the living room at night. I move them around like an elf on the shelf. My 7 year old daughter thinks that is funny.
customer_reviews.author: Roswell2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Prop
customer_reviews.text: It is great skeleton. It is a good size, sturdy and is posable like advertised. Perfect decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Pank

customer_reviews.title: Boo!
customer_reviews.text: I change them out to new sets everyday in October. I have so much fun, made well and delivery is great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Bones
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sucker for skeletons for Halloween. Very well made and would purchase again!! *This little guy has turned out to be quite sturdy and easily posable. I ordered a second one today.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

product_meta.title: Crazy Bonez Pose-N-Stay Skeleton
product_meta.description: Style:Original Pose-N-Stay| Design:SkeletonNo haunted house is complete without a Crazy Bonez skeleton in the closet! Crazy Bonez stands approximately 60" Tall and features realistic molded bones. The detailed bones include a full rib cage, spine, arms and legs, and skull with a movable jaw. Crazy Bonez limbs are poseable, with knees that lock into place to hold a position. Will stand erect against a wall and will be stiff but cannot stand freely. The Crazy Bonez skeleton stand (sold separately) is the perfect accessory to make him stand on his own!
feature_bullets: Posable limbs with knees that lock into place to hold a position
Part of the original Crazy Bonez skeleton line
Spooky addition to any Halloween scene or display

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
